Description: A shooting unfolded outside a nightclub on New Year's Eve that killed a man and sent three others to the hospital.[14]
Four people were wounded after a shooting at a party. All four are expected to survive.[15]
Four men were wounded after a shooting near a restaurant.[16] One of the wounded later died from his injuries.[17]
Six people were wounded in an evening shooting. One of the victims later died at the hospital.[18]

Don Carter Lanes shooting: Three people are killed and three others injured in a shooting at a bowling alley. The shooter is believed to have selected his victims at random. A person of interest has been taken into custody by authorities.[19]
Two men were killed and two injured in an early morning targeted shooting in Ybor City.[20]
Three adults and a juvenile were wounded in an afternoon drive-by shooting. One of the wounded later died at the hospital.[21]
Four people were injured and one was killed after a shooting on Christmas Day.[22]
A woman shot her mother and three young daughters in a murder-suicide.[23][24]
After a teenager got into a conflict with another group, four people were injured and one was killed after a shooting at the teenager's home.[25]
Four individuals were discovered killed in three separate homes after wellness checks were called for them. The perpetrator died of a self inflicted gunshot wound.[26]
A man killed his wife and two sons before turning the gun on himself.[27][28]
Two men were killed at a sports bar in an apparent targeted shooting. Two innocent bystanders were wounded.[29]

Six people were wounded after someone walked into and opened fire inside a South Side beauty salon in the Burnside neighborhood, shortly after midnight. The salon was hosting an after hours party.[30]
Three men and a woman were shot in the Kingsessing neighborhood.  Cocaine and firearms were recovered on the scene.[31]
Following a dispute outside of a restaurant four were people shot.[32]

A family member discovered two parents and two children, aged 12 and 13-years-old, killed in their home. The killer was reportedly a third teenaged child of the family.[33] The shooter was sentenced to life in prison in 2023.[34]
A man was killed and three others wounded in an early morning shooting.[35]
A man was killed and three others were wounded inside a deli.[36]
Four men were wounded in an afternoon shooting in the Boerum Hill neighborhood of Brooklyn.[37]
A man was killed and three others wounded at a large early morning gathering.[38]
Four people were wounded near the Charles Spencer Elementary School during school hours. No students were harmed or in danger.[39]

Five men were wounded in a late night shooting. They were playing dice outside an apartment complex when a man drove up and started shooting. The man chased them through the complex before fleeing.[40]
Two people were killed and two wounded in a parking lot after an SUV pulled into it.[41]
2020 Williamsburg massacre: 25-year-old Oreanna Myers shot and killed five children, aged between one and seven, with a shotgun before setting her house on fire and committing suicide.[42]

A group of four men attempted to rob a home at gun point. The home owner opened fire in defense and killed two of the robbers and wounded the other two. The homeowner's four-year-old child was also wounded.[43]
Six people were wounded at a rodeo outdoor live music venue, with one to two thousand attendees present. Police had been called to the venue three times prior to the shooting, due to fights.[44]
Officers responding to reports of a shooting shortly after midnight found a woman dead and three other individuals injured.[45]
Shortly before midnight an argument between two men at a bonfire escalated. Six people were wounded.[46]
Three men and a seventeen-year-old girl were injured after someone shot at them from across the street. The group was standing outside a home in West Garfield Park.[47]
An eighteen-year-old was killed and three other teenagers were injured after a dispute between two groups escalated.[48]
A man was killed, and shortly later a woman and two children; aged 10 and 7-years-old were killed at a home. An additional child was found uninjured in the home.[49]
Eleven people were shot at a motorcycle club. The injured were treated at nearby hospitals and no arrests have been made.[50]
Two people were killed and two wounded in an apartment complex near Memphis International Airport.[51]
Four people were shot in the evening, in New Orleans East.[52]
A man was killed and fourteen other people were injured shortly after midnight at a nightclub. At least three men fled in a vehicle and continued to fire from the vehicle.[53]
A woman was killed and five people wounded by gunfire and two stabbed outside a nightclub after an early morning argument.[54]
Five people were wounded while leaving a club in the early morning. A sixth person was wounded by a stray bullet while at home.[55]
One person was killed and four injured in a shooting outside a 7-Eleven store. The possible suspects were arrested on other charges in nearby Parker, Arizona.[56]
Four people were wounded in an evening shooting in the Stuyvesant area.[57]
A woman was killed and six others were injured at a party in the Bedford–Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn.[58]
Six people were wounded in an early morning shooting in Gresham on the South Side after a man opened fire on them from the sidewalk.[59]
A woman was killed and three adults and a teenager were wounded at an illegal warehouse party.[60]
Two people were killed and two others wounded at a Sonic Drive-In after police responded to a call of a bomb inside a truck. A suspect has been arrested.[61]

A family of four, a husband and wife and their two adult sons, were shot in their home. The husband is in critical condition at a local hospital. A recently discharged gun was found at the scene and police do not believe there is a suspect at large.[62]

Mayfair Mall shooting: Eight people were hospitalized with non-life-threatening injuries after a person opened fire at the Mayfair Mall. Several people, including a 15-year-old boy from Milwaukee, have been arrested in the case.[63][64]
One person was killed and three injured in a drive-by shooting while standing under a carport.[65]
A man shot and killed his uncle and cousin and wounded his wife and aunt before committing suicide. His uninjured infant daughter was also in the home.[66]
Four people were wounded in an evening shooting.[67]
Four people were wounded at a home that had been the site of a break in back in January 2020.[68]
Two adults and two children under the age of seven were wounded in a drive-by shooting. They were standing outside a home in Golden Glades.[69]
Four people were wounded in a drive-by shooting while walking down a road on the West Side. Two of the wounded were teenage girls.[70]
Four people were wounded at the Dearborn homes after another group began an argument which escalated.[71]
Five people were shot shortly after midnight while attending a street gathering.[72]
Two men were killed and two injured at a trailer park in a late night shooting.[73]
Shortly before midnight, three people were killed and a pregnant woman wounded in a home.[74]
Four people were wounded in a late night shooting at an event center. The center had been rented out for a birthday party prior to the shooting.[75]
Four teenagers, aged between twelve and fifteen, were wounded in an evening drive by shooting in the Winton Hills area.[76]
Officers responding to an assault with a deadly weapon call found two men who later died at a hospital. Three additional wounded individuals were identified at a hospital.[77]
Officers responding to reports of multiple gunshots found two men dead and four wounded in an evening shooting.[78]
Six people were shot, including two police officers, when an argument inside a nightclub escalated.[79]
A man was killed and seven other men and teenagers were wounded in a drive-by shooting. A car opened fire on a group gathered at a basketball court next to a Boys & Girls Club.[80]
Two adults and two children were wounded in an afternoon shooting at a local food mart. Police are investigating it as possible gang activity.[81]
Two adults and two children under the age of twelve were wounded in a gated apartment complex.[82]
Eight people and a dog were injured in a shooting on Commerce Street in the early hours of the morning.[83]
Four men were wounded outside a local bar shortly before midnight.[84]
One individual was killed and three injured inside a local bar shortly after midnight.[85]
Two people were wounded and two killed in the Hollygrove section of the city. One of those killed may have been the target of the shooting.[86]
Three people were killed and one injured near an apartment complex. The shooting is believed to be connected to a hit and run accident just down the road.[87]
Four people were wounded in a shooting in a parking lot at a local sporting complex and gym located near the Jefferson City High School.[88]

Henderson shooting: A man shot and killed three people at an apartment complex before being shot dead by police. A fifth person was taken to a hospital with gunshot wounds but the condition of the person was not yet known.[89]
A man was killed and three wounded near a local bar that was hosting a Halloween party in the early morning.[90]
Six people were wounded in an early morning shooting at a party in an abandoned house.[91]
A man was killed and three others wounded shortly after midnight. A suspect was arrested shortly after.[92]
Four people were wounded outside of a bar after an early morning argument escalated in a large crowd. The bar was the scene of a similar shooting in February 2019.[93]
A man was killed and three others injured after someone fired into an event center.[94]
Two men were killed and two wounded outside an apartment building that was hosting a Halloween party, in the early morning.[95]
Two men were killed and two wounded in the desert near Tucson International Airport in the early morning.[96]
Four people were wounded in a drive-by shooting in the Natomas area. Those wounded had gathered at a home there.[97]
Five people were wounded after an argument escalated outside of a house party, shortly after midnight.[98]
Four people were wounded in an early morning shooting at a strip club. The shooter pulled up outside the club and opened fire.[99]
Seven people were wounded at a party held in a hotel room at the University of Maryland.[100]
Four people were shot in a neighborhood, at a believed house party after a dispute escalated. The wounded are believed to be teenagers.[101]
Two groups of men got into a dispute inside a cigar and hookah lounge and the argument escalated. One man was killed and three injured.[102]
A man was killed and two adults and a sixteen-year-old were injured after a man entered a home in Morgan Park and opened fire. Police believe the shooting was drug related.[103]
A patrol officer discovered four people wounded after an argument escalated late at night. One of the victims has a concealed weapons permit, but officers are unsure who actually fired.[104]
One individual was killed and three others wounded after a heated argument escalated.[105]
Officers responded to a report of multiple shots fired and found four individuals wounded in a home.[106]
An eighteen-year-old was killed and three other teens were wounded in a house during the evening.[107]
A fight broke out at an early morning house party and escalated. Two men were killed and three others wounded.[108]

A dispute potentially near I-35 escalated and four people within a car were shot. The car crashed a short time later. Three adults and a thirteen-year-old were wounded and three additional children were not injured.[109]
Four men were shot in the early morning. Two men were later arrested for the shooting and a wounded man died later at the hospital.[110]
A gunman walked into a family's front yard and opened fire on a family gathering shortly before midnight. The family had gathered for a funeral and two were killed and eight wounded.[111]
Shortly before midnight someone opened fire in a Miami neighborhood. A man was killed and two adults and an infant girl were wounded.[112]
Officers responded to a gunfire locator alert and multiple 911 calls and found two individuals wounded. An additional two transported themselves to the hospital.[113]
Three men and a woman were wounded in a shooting shortly after midnight.[114]
A vehicle with six passengers – two adults and four juveniles –  was traveling on I-10 when a car next to them opened fire. Five people in the car were wounded.[115]
A man was killed and five other people were wounded in a drive-by shooting in Prospect Lefferts Gardens in Brooklyn.[116]
A gunman ambushed four people waiting in a car at a McDonald's drive through. One person in the car was killed and two adults and a thirteen-year-old were injured.[117]
An argument at a local open-mike night for rappers at a club escalated when at least two people opened fire. Three men were killed and one injured.[118]
Five people were wounded in a drive-by-shooting while standing outside a house during a party. A seventeen-year-old and four adults were among the injured.[119]
A man was killed and three others wounded after gunfire erupted in front of a convenience store.[120]
An argument at an early morning house party escalated and one man was killed. Another adult and two seventeen-year-old girls were wounded.[121]
A gunman walked into an East Garfield Park home and opened fire. He killed one man and wounded four others.[122]
Two men were discovered wounded at a home near Belmont University, and two others arrived at local hospitals later.[123]

Shortly after midnight two men approached a home hosting a Halloween themed house party opened fire on the closed garage door. A 21-year-old college student was killed and five others were wounded.[124]
A patrol officer heard gunfire near a local lounge in the early morning, and found a wounded man. Four others were transported by private vehicles to local hospitals.[125]
Shortly before midnight two men were killed and four injured at a local restaurant.[126]
Three people were killed and one wounded after an argument occurred in the early morning at a private motorcycle club over a motorcycle. The wounded victim is refusing to cooperate with police.[127]
Six people were injured in a drive-by shooting and one was killed. Three of the injured were children and three were adults. The victim killed was one year old.[128]
A man was killed and another and two women were injured in an evening shooting.[129]
Seven people were wounded in an evening shooting in Southwest Baltimore. Two people were discovered at the scene and five were later discovered at area hospitals.[130]
A party after a University of Louisiana football game in Moore Park led to an early morning shooting after an argument escalated. Two people were wounded and two killed.[131]
Four men were injured at a gas station in an evening shooting in Southwest Philadelphia.[132]
A man was killed and four others were injured at a local grocery store early in the morning. One of the injured died three days later.[133]
Four people were wounded in an evening shooting at a downtown hotel. Additional guns and pills were discovered at the scene of the shooting.[134]
Four people were inside a vehicle when they were hit by gunfire near the West Garfield Park on the West Side. A man died and two adults and a seventeen-year-old girl were wounded.[135]

A man opened fire after he was ejected from a nightclub by firing into the club while standing in the road. Three people were discovered in the club and five were taken to the hospital in private vehicles.[136]
A woman and her six-year-old daughter were killed and her other daughters aged sixteen and ten-years-old were wounded. The woman's boyfriend was arrested as a person of interest.[137]
At least two gunmen opened fire on a group of people in the city's Frankford neighborhood. One man was killed and six others wounded.[138]
A man was killed and one man and three women were injured in an early morning shooting at a house party. Two teenagers were arrested and charged for the shooting.[139]
One man was killed and three injured in an evening shooting at a Brooklyn building. Neighbors claim that the building was a local gambling den.[140]
Two men and two women were shot in an evening shooting, with one victim in critical condition.[141]
Police responding to reports of an early morning shooting found three men dead outside an establishment. Four additional wounded were identified at the hospital after transporting themselves.[142]

A fight broke out between two women inside a store and shortly after three men arrived with guns and entered the store. The men opened fire, and customers returned fire, with one man killed and three adults and two juveniles injured.[143]
A nine-year-old girl was killed and two adults and a six-year-old girl were wounded at a Del Paso Heights park. They were part of a family gathering when a gunman drove up and opened fire.[144]
At least five people were wounded in an early morning shooting at a house party. An argument had broken out and escalated into gun fire.[145]
A seventeen-year-old girl and three others were wounded in an evening shooting in Rainier Valley.[146]
Four people were wounded in a shooting in the Central Business District. Victims ran away from the original scene causing officers to believe there were more shootings than actual.[147]
Two women and three men were wounded in a shooting shortly before midnight in a rental hall.[148]
Four North Carolina A&T State University students were wounded in an off-campus apartment complex.[149]
Seven people were shot at a funeral home.[150]
Two men and two women were wounded inside an apartment with no signs of a break-in.[151]
Five men were wounded shortly before midnight while standing on a porch in the Logan section of the city.[152]
Two men were killed and two wounded in an afternoon shooting. The men were recording a music video and got into an argument with another group which escalated.[153]
Four men and two women were injured in an early morning shooting after a large crowd had congregated outside a Gentleman's club in the city's southwest side.[154]
Four people were wounded near an intersection in the afternoon after an argument escalated. The gunman walked away to his vehicle, retrieved a pistol, opened fire, and drove away.[155]
A man shot and wounded four people shortly before midnight, with one victim discovered in a vehicle by police.[156]
A nineteen-year-old was killed and three others injured in an evening shooting.[157]

Two teens, aged fifteen and sixteen-years-old and two adults were wounded just before midnight at a block party in West Philadelphia. The teens and one adult had been leaving the party when the gunman opened fire.[158]
One man died and three others injured after someone opened fire on an early morning party in an apartment complex parking lot.[159]

Two people were killed and six injured in a shooting at a motorcycle club where over 100 people had gathered. Four others suffered injuries from broken glass and debris while fleeing from the gunfire.[160]
Two men and two women were injured in an early morning drive-by shooting in Marquette Park on the Southwest Side.[161]
Four teenagers aged between seventeen and nineteen-years-old were injured in a late night shooting in the Frankford section of the city.[162]
A woman was killed and her mother and young child were injured when a man entered the home and shot. He shot and injured an additional woman while carjacking her in an attempt to flee.[163]
Three men and two women were injured outside a bar early in the morning after an argument escalated. The bar was the scene of another mass shooting in June were a man died and six were injured.[164]

A man barged into a home in the early morning and opened fire, wounding four adults and killing a four-year-old child. The child reportedly was held by his mother when the man opened fire and was struck and killed in her arms.[165]
Two women were discovered wounded in front of a house in Queens by police. Two men arrived at the hospital by private vehicles at a later time.[166]
A woman was killed and three others injured in a housing complex parking lot shortly after midnight. A large crowd had gathered and someone opened fire.[167]
A woman was killed and four other people were injured in an early morning shooting at a street party.[168]
Rochester shooting: Two people were killed and 14 others were injured in Rochester at a backyard party on Pennsylvania Avenue.[169]

Four people were wounded in West Pullman less than an hour after the shooting in West Englewood. Two sedans pulled up to a group outside and opened fire towards people on the sidewalk, home porch and inside the home.[170]
Four men were wounded in West Englewood while standing outside when someone opened fire.[171]
Police officers responded to a shooting after a ShotShopper alert and found four people wounded.[172]
Five people were shot in an evening shooting.[173]
Four people were wounded in a drive-by afternoon shooting, near I-630.[174]

Two men were killed and three wounded while playing basketball at the Roberto Clemente Playground in Spring Garden. Police believe the men were targeted as the three shooters chased them down, after the first confrontation.[175]
Two people were killed and three others injured in a quintuple shooting near San Jose State University.[176]
Five people, including three teenagers, were wounded in a drive by shooting. The group were outside celebrating Mexican Independence.[177]
Three people were wounded in a vehicle and a fourth while walking down the street, after a drug deal turned into a robbery. One of the wounded was an eight-year-old girl.[citation needed]
Two people died and six others were injured in an overnight shooting near Rutgers University.[178]
Seven people were wounded in a late night shooting outside a business in the city's southeast side. One victim's injuries were considered life-threatening.[179]

A man opened fire inside a vehicle on I-24 and killed one person in his vehicle and wounded another. He attempted to carjack three vehicles and wounded two people, before taking two hostages. At the end of the hostage taking a hostage and the gunman were dead and the other hostage released.[180]
A security guard and three club goers were wounded after an individual opened fire from a car shortly after midnight.[181]
A man was killed and two adults and a seventeen-year-old boy were wounded while sitting on a homes porch in Englewood, after two men exited a vehicle and opened fire.[182]

A man opened fire at an early morning house party after an argument escalated in the Austin neighborhood. Another individual returned fire causing the first shooter and three others to be wounded and two others killed.[183]
Four adults and a teenager were wounded after a verbal altercation at a house party escalated.[184]
Five people were wounded at a large party, with one aged sixteen-years-old.[185]
Four minutes after a shooting, police were alerted to a second in which three men died, and one wounded.[186]
A man was killed and three others wounded in the Wellston neighborhood.[187]
Five people including a seventeen-year-old were injured while playing a dice game when a vehicle pulled up and opened fire.[188]
Four people including a fourteen-year-old boy were injured in Central City.[189]
A fifteen-year-old shooter opened fire at a group of people in a drive-by shooting, including a six-year-old in Brooklyn. Police believe the shooting to be gang related.[190]
An eighteen-year-old was killed and four others injured after a fight broke out during a party in the Butler-Tarkington neighborhood over a broken table.[191]
A shooting at a large marijuana grow house left seven people dead.[192]
An eight-year-old girl was killed and three others injured when another vehicle opened fire on them while they were sitting in another car in the Canaryville neighborhood.[193]
Four people were wounded in the South Shore neighborhood in a drive-by shooting. Three adults and a seventeen-year-old were injured.[194]
Four people were wounded at a large house party after a fight broke out in the early morning.[195]
Two people opened fire in an apartment and wounded three adults and a five-year-old child.[196]
Responding officers found a wounded man and three other wounded individuals transported themselves to the hospital.[197]
Six people were wounded in Swope Park where a large crowd had gathered to watch cars do burnouts and donuts.[198]
One woman was killed and three others injured in the Hamilton Heights neighborhood.[199]
Responding officers found a man dead and two wounded at an early morning birthday party. Four other wounded were identified at the hospital.[200]
Five people were wounded at a night club, and separate charges were filed against the club owner for operating during COVID-19 restrictions.[201]
A woman and three men were wounded after a party with multiple motorcycle clubs, had a large fight in the parking lot with multiple shooters.[202]

A man was found wounded at the River Market district, with witnesses stating the shooter opened fire after pulling a gun from his fanny pack. Three children aged, seventeen, sixteen and twelve-years-old were also wounded.[203]
Two men were discovered wounded by responding officers, one of whom later died at the hospital. Two more wounded were identified after transporting themselves to the hospital.[204]
Six people were wounded in an early morning shooting at a block party/protest that was organized by a man to protest "inequitable narratives."[205]
Four men were wounded in a drive-by shooting shortly before midnight.[206]

Five men aged eighteen to twenty-six-years-old were found wounded in an east Germantown street shortly before midnight. A sixth man was found wounded in his apartment building from a stray bullet a half-block away.[207]

Two bystanders including a seventeen-year-old were wounded shortly before midnight at an apartment complex. Two additional wounded were discovered later by police, who stated the shooting occurred after the individuals they had met to purchase guns from, turned on them and opened fire.[208]
A nineteen-year-old was killed and two nineteen-year-old and an eighteen-year-old were injured, when a car pulled up alongside their vehicle and opened fire on I-530.[209]
Two seventeen-year-olds were killed and a seventeen and eighteen year old wounded in a shooting in Point Breeze.[210]
One man was killed and two other adults and a sixteen-year-old were wounded while playing cards in an early morning drive-by shooting.[211]
Three teenagers, two fifteen-year-olds and a seventeen-year-old, and an adult were wounded in the Brookfield Village neighborhood in East Oakland. Police believe it to be a targeted shooting.[212]
Police responding to a call of several people shot, found two adults and two teenagers aged thirteen and seventeen-years-old wounded in a townhouse complex.[213]

A nineteen and seventeen-year-old were killed and two other teenagers were wounded, when a vehicle pulled up to the car that they were in and opened fire. Officers believe at least one person in the vehicle was the intended target.[214]
Seven people were wounded at a community gathering at a local community center. Eyewitnesses were split on how the shooting occurred.[215]
Five people were wounded in an early morning shooting, with one later dying at a hospital.[216]
Five people were shot, one fatally, at a restaurant in Morgan Park.[217]
Four adults and a fourteen-year-old girl were injured at a block party when an unknown individual opened fire early in the morning.[218]
A drive by shooting injured three adults standing outside early in the morning. An eight-year-old boy was injured when a bullet entered his bedroom through a wall.[219]
Shortly before midnight a group was walking down an alley toward a store, when they were approached by three men. One opened fire and killed two of the group and injured two others.[220]
A man was killed and five others injured in an early morning shooting near a local pub.[221]
Four adults and a fifteen-year-old boy were wounded in a late night shooting in the Deep Ellum district.[222]
Four men were wounded by multiple shooters who fled the scene in the car they shot from.[223]
A sixteen-year-old boy was killed and three other juveniles were wounded in Gateway Discovery Park.[224]
A man engaged in a year-long dispute with neighbors, shot four of them as they sat on his porch. Three died and one was wounded, with the shooter later turning himself in.[225]
Three men and a woman were injured in a late night shooting, while in a large gathering.[226]
Three adults and a seventeen-year-old boy were injured in East Germantown in an evening shooting.[227]
Norfolk police said five people were shot on Wednesday night. One of the victims was a 1-month-old child. No suspect information is available at this time.[228]
Four men were wounded in an evening shooting, with two being transported to the hospital in private vehicles.[229]
Four men were wounded after a vehicle pulled up and opened fire, with one of the wounded returning fire.[230]
A man was killed and three others wounded, in an early morning shooting.[231]
Four people were wounded in an evening shooting.[232]
A man was killed and four others including a teenage boy were wounded in a night shooting.[233]
Seven people were wounded when gunfire erupted while a large crowd was gathered outside a gas station early in the morning.[234]
A man was killed and three others wounded in a housing complex in Brooklyn in the early morning.[235]
A nineteen-year-old man was killed and two men and two women injured in an early morning shooting at a party.[236]
Four men were wounded at a party outside an apartment complex when a fight escalated early in the morning.[237]
Four men were wounded standing outside a business in the Englewood neighborhood, in an afternoon drive-by shooting.[238]

Early in the morning responding officers found three wounded individuals at a home near Pikes Peak International Raceway. Three more wounded were identified at a local hospital and some of the wounded are teenagers. Officers believe the shooting happened at a house party.[239]
Shortly before midnight one man was killed and three others injured.[240]
One person was killed and three wounded after an early morning shooting near the Allison Bonnet Memorial Drive.[241]
A gun fight wounded two adults and two seventeen-year-olds in West Philadelphia.[242]
Five adults and a seventeen-year-old were wounded after a man stepped out of a vehicle and opened fire on a large gathering. The shooting took place in Gresham in the South Side.[243]
A man was killed and four others wounded including a fifteen-year-old in the Strawberry Mansion neighborhood.[244]
A car drove up to a Ravenswood Public Housing building in Queens and opened fire. A seventeen-year-old boy and three adults were wounded.[245]
Four people were wounded in the early morning at a large gathering in Twin Sisters Park.[246]
Two people were killed and two people were wounded in a shooting late at night before the car they were in crashed.[247]
Five people were wounded at Dove Park in an evening drive-by shooting.[248]
Four men were wounded in an early morning shooting in Brooklyn. The suspected gunman fled in a car after opening fire.[249]
A man is accused of killing his ex-girlfriend, a man in her home, and a neighbor and wounding two others. He was later arrested after hiding in the surrounding woods.[250]
Five people were injured, one critically, in a shooting caused by a dispute at a flea market. A security guard returned fire.[251]
One person died at the scene and one later at the hospital with nine others wounded in an early morning shooting.[252]
An eighteen-year-old was killed and three others wounded after a disturbance occurred at a large gathering.[253]
Two men were killed and five others were wounded in a shooting shortly after an earlier shooting.[254]
Responding officers found a man wounded shortly after midnight, who later died at the hospital. Three others arrived by private vehicles to the hospital.[255]
Four people were wounded at a large birthday party in the parking lot.[256]
Four adults and a sixteen-year-old boy were injured shortly before midnight at a large block party when a group on motorcycles arrived and opened fire.[257]
Five people were wounded shortly before midnight.[258]

Two men and two women were killed in a home, with one of the women killed identified as the shooter's former fiancée. The shooter boasted about the killings on social media and text messages before being arrested.[259]
One man was killed and five injured after a dice game grew violent shortly before midnight.[260]
Officers arrived at a large gathering early in the morning to disperse it. While doing so shots were fired in the apartment complex's parking lot. Two men were killed and three others wounded.[261]
Three women and one man were wounded late at night on Lenox Avenue in Harlem.[262]
A woman was killed and three others wounded in a drive by shooting in the early morning.[263]
An eighteen-year-old was killed and four others wounded shortly after midnight.[264]

Five people were wounded shortly after midnight outside of a warehouse in the Harbor Gateway neighborhood. The shooting occurred after an argument escalated, and an additional person was injured attempting to climb a fence.[265]
Ten people were injured in a drive-by shooting during a family gathering in a park.[266]
Six people were wounded in the early morning after a large gathering turned violent near a shopping center.[267]
A 17-year-old boy was killed and 21 others injured, including an off-duty police officer, at a party in the southeastern section of the nation's capital. Police are looking for three suspects.[268]
Four people were wounded in the evening, two of the victims drove away and later crashed outside a local bank.[269]
Four men were wounded being a gas station shortly before midnight. The men were playing dice, when a gunman walked up, shot them and fled on foot.[270]
Shortly before midnight a man was killed and four others wounded in the city's north side.[271]
A pregnant woman, three teenagers and two other women were wounded. They were a part of a large BBQ gathering at a public park.[272]
Five men were wounded at a house party which was detected by the city's gunshot detection system. Prior a woman from the same party was stabbed.[273]

A man was killed and five people, including an off-duty Birmingham Police officer, were wounded at a motorcycle club in Ensley. The shooting was reported to be due to an altercation escalating, with some of the victims innocent bystanders.[274]
A 18-year-old man was killed and a 22-year-old, 28-year-old, and 29-year-old were injured in a drive by shooting involving multiple suspected perpetrators.[275]
A man was killed and three others injured while standing outside a house party.[276]
An 8-year-old boy and three men were wounded in the North Lawndale neighborhood. The shooter exited a vehicle and opened fire on the group while they were standing on the sidewalk.[277]
Four people were wounded in Garner Park during a memorial service for a recently deceased individual. Over 300 people were gathered when gunfire broke out and a fifth person was injured fleeing.[278]
Four men were wounded in an evening shooting.[279]
A woman was killed and four others were injured at a rented mansion house party. The home was on the famed Mulholland Drive in the Beverly Crest neighborhood.[280]
A woman was killed and two adults and a 17-year-old were injured near the former ABB manufacturing plant. The plant was the scene of a mass shooting in 2010.[281]
A man was killed and five others injured after an early morning shooting at a large gathering at a warehouse.[282]
Four people were wounded after a shooter opened fire on a large crowd watching a basketball game at St. Mary's Park in the Bronx.[283]
Four women were injured with gun fire in the early morning. A fifth woman was stabbed multiple times.[284]
Four adults and a 10-year-old child were wounded after multiple heavily armed shooters opened fire on males in a specific block.[285]
A man was killed and four others, two men and two women, were injured at a backyard BBQ. Responding officers arrested two men fleeing from the scene.[286]

Two men were killed and two adults and an infant were injured. A man entered a home where a child's birthday party was ongoing and opened fire. Two guests returned fire and were among the injured.[287]
A 16-year-old was killed and three adults and a girl were wounded at a large gathering in the Westwood neighborhood.[288]
Four men were injured after a shooting at an entrance to I-85 South.[289]
A woman was killed and three men were wounded in an evening shooting.[290]
Five men were wounded after a potentially gang related shooting occurred behind a U-Gas Station. A witness likened the amount of gunfire to the Iraq war.[291]
A man opened fire at a gas station while screaming at passersby. He wounded five people before he was arrested.[292]
Three men and a woman were injured while standing outside and a person opened fire from a car.[293]
Three men were killed and a third injured after an afternoon dispute escalated between two groups of people.[294]
A man killed his wife and three children, aged 12, 10 and 6-years-old, and then himself in an apparent murder-suicide.[295]
A 17-year-old and a woman were killed and two men were injured in a shooting.[296]
Four men were injured in the evening.[297]
A 17-year-old was killed and two adults and a 12-year-old injured at Steel Lake Park. A woman reportedly opened fire after an argument.[298]
Five people were sitting on a porch in the evening when one was killed and four injured in a drive-by shooting.[299]
Four people were injured in the early morning after at least two semi-automatic handguns were fired at a large house party.[300]
Four people were injured shortly after midnight when someone opened fire during the Rude Boyz Annual Trail Ride. The gathering was held at Durango's Canyon.[301]

One person was killed and three others were injured when two men opened fire in a restaurant. One man was charged with open murder, three counts of assault with intent to murder and multiple weapons charges. The other man was charged with careless discharge of a firearm.[302]
Responding officers to a large gathering in the early morning found a man dead. Three additional victims were transported in private vehicles to the hospital.[303]

Officers responded to I-64 West in the early morning after calls of shots fired by a moving vehicle. They found four individuals shot, with one dead, in a crashed car. A fifth individual was wounded when the car crashed.[304]
A woman and three men were wounded near a local restaurant.[305]
Officers responded from a traffic stop after hearing gunfire. They discovered seven people wounded at a large house party after a man armed with a semi-automatic weapon arrived and opened fire.[306]
Six people were shot at a party of over 1,000 people following the filming of a music video in a parking lot.[307]

A seven-year-old girl, a sixteen-month boy and two adults were shot by a passing vehicle while getting out of a car. The girl was declared brain dead at the hospital, causing the shooting to be declared a homicide.[308]
Two men were killed and two women and a man were wounded in the Park Hill neighborhood.[309]
Three men and a woman were injured shortly before midnight. A man was denied entry at a local bar, retrieved an assault-type weapon from his car, and shot into the building.[310]

Two adults were killed and two teenagers, aged seventeen and eighteen, were injured in an early morning shooting. The group were ambushed by two shooters after arriving at an AirBnb house party in a rideshare.[311]
One man was killed and three others injured in the early morning. Officers are investigating if the individuals were a part of an announced party for that night.[312]
Four people were wounded in an early morning shooting.[313]
Two people were killed and four injured while standing on the sidewalk in the West Pullman area of the Far South Side.[314]
A man opened fire and others returned fire at a large party with at least one hundred people in attendance. Four people were injured in the shooting.[315]
Fifteen people were injured, four critically, after a shooter opened fire at people leaving a funeral home in Chicago's Auburn Gresham neighborhood.[316]
Five people were wounded in the North Lawndale neighborhood. They were a part of people gathered on the sidewalk when a car pulled up and several men got out and opened fire.[317]
One man was killed and four others injured after a fight in a McDonald's parking lot escalated. One of the injured was an innocent bystander in the Food Lion parking lot across the street.[318]

Thirteen people were injured in an early morning shooting at a riverfront gathering. An argument between two women led to a man firing two shots into the air. This led to multiple individuals opening fire on the crowd.[319]
Eight people including a fifteen-year-old girl were injured in a drive by shooting early in the morning.[320]
Two people were killed and three wounded shortly before midnight in Morgan Park on the Far South Side. They were part of a group of people, that were fired upon by  an unknown shooter.[321]
Police responding to reports of a shooting discovered one man killed and eight other adults wounded.[322]

Two fifteen-year-olds and two seventeen-year-olds were wounded while sitting in traffic when another car pulled up and opened fire. Four days later, the suspect was shot by police after a pursuit in which he was found holding a gun and died at a hospital.[323][324]
A man opened fire in a restaurant, killing three men and injuring another. The shooter has been taken into custody.[325]
A man was killed and four others wounded after two men opened fire in the early morning in the North Lawndale neighborhood. The men were standing on a street corner.[326]
Four adults were wounded while attending a memorial in Weinland Park. A three-year-old girl was also wounded when bullets struck the home she was in.[327]
Three adults and a child were injured after a man, out on bond from a January arrest, entered their home and opened fire.[328]
Eight or nine people opened fire in the early morning in a drive-by shooting. Five people were wounded, including a juvenile.[329]
Two gunmen opened fire in the early morning outside a Brooklyn apartment building. A man was killed and five other adults were wounded.[330]
A man was killed and two adults and an 11-year-old child were injured after an argument escalated from an original argument at a basketball court.[331]
Five men were injured while standing in a park after a vehicle drove by and opened fire.[332]
Six adults and two children aged four and eight-years-old were wounded after someone opened fire at a party outside a home.[333]
Multiple shooters traveled across three different blocks and wounded six people in Brooklyn.[334]
A 16-year-old was killed and three others, including two juveniles, were wounded at a gas station.[335]
Five adults and a teenager were wounded after an argument escalated at a Metro bus stop.[336]

Two people were killed and three injured at a large outdoor hip hop concert in which potentially five separate guns were used. An additional three people were injured while attempting to flee, after being hit by cars.[337]
A man was killed and seven others injured in an early morning shooting outside an Exxon gas station.[338]
Three women and two men were injured after someone opened fire outside an apartment complex. At the complex there was a large party happening with over 100 people present.[339]
Two men opened fire on a late night cookout at the Raymond Bush Playground in Brooklyn. Three men were injured and an infant sitting in a stroller was killed.[340]
Two men were killed in an early morning shooting at a party, with two others wounded.[341]
A man was killed and two other men and a woman were wounded in Englewood in the evening.[342]
Four men were wounded and one killed in an early morning shooting. The group was standing in the street when a verbal altercation escalated with at least two shooters.[343]
Responding officers to an early morning block party arrived to gunfire. Two wounded individuals were identified at the party and four others were identified at local hospitals.[344]
Four teenagers aged between 15 and 13-years-old and 10-year-old child were wounded. Someone opened fire on a playground late at night.[345]
In a late night shooting, four people were killed and three injured. Officers suspect the shooting was retaliation by people recently released from prison.[346]
Shortly after midnight an individual stormed an apartment and wounded a man and four teenagers aged 14 to 19-years-old.[347]
Shots were fired into a group of people in the Auburn Gresham area on the South Side. The evening shooting wounded six.[348]
Two men were killed and four others - two men and two women - were injured in a shooting at a late-night party.[349]
Three men waiting at a stop light and were wounded when someone opened fire. Comedian Rickey Smiley's daughter was a passenger in another vehicle and was also wounded.[350]
A 16-year-old girl and three adults were wounded by gunfire while standing in an alley in the West Side's Fifth City neighborhood in the early morning.[351]
Officers arrived at an early morning fight and heard shots being fired. They later discovered a man killed by the gunfire and three others injured.[352]
At least two people are killed and eight injured, four critically, at a nightclub. No suspects have been arrested.[353]
Four adults and a 15-year-old boy were injured in an early morning shooting in Inwood, Manhattan.[354]
A man was killed and three others injured in a parking lot, after leaving an event held by rapper Bankroll Freddie. People were leaving the event when someone fired into the crowd.[355]
Shortly after midnight three men and one woman were injured.[356]
Four people were wounded in an early morning shooting, with potentially multiple weapons used.[357]
A large group of people were watching fireworks, when a fight broke out after a car hit a pedestrian. Fourteen people were wounded, of which two were declared dead at the hospital.[358]
A woman was killed and five men were wounded in an early morning drive-by shooting. The group was setting off fireworks when the car approached.[359]

A 20-year-old opened fire on a group of six people after getting into an altercation and taking a rifle from his father. Four of the group were injured and the 20-year-old and his father were arrested.[360]
An adult and 11-year-old girl were killed shortly after midnight, three others were wounded. Officers believe that there were two shooters.[361]
Shortly after midnight a man was killed and five others were wounded.[362]
Five teenagers were wounded shortly after midnight after a shooting occurred at a house party.[363]
A group of people were traveling in a party bus, when someone opened fire on the vehicle. Four people in the bus were wounded.[364]
Four men were wounded in Marlow Heights, one man later died at the hospital.[365]
Two adults and two children were injured in a drive-by shooting.[366]
A group of people were fired at by an individual in a vehicle, shortly before midnight. Five people were wounded.[367]
An early morning shooting occurred at a nightclub, after an altercation escalated. One person was killed and three others wounded.[368]
A man was killed and three others injured in a late night shooting in South Chicago.[369]
Four people are killed, and at least four more were injured at an outdoor gathering in Englewood when four men opened fire into a crowd. No suspects have been arrested.[370]
A man was killed and four others injured at a July 4 cookout.[371]
Four women were injured in a late night shooting in southwest Baltimore.[372]
A suspected shootout occurred inside the Riverchase Galleria in the afternoon. An 8-year-old boy was killed and two adults and a girl were injured.[373]
A group of five were shot after a man got out of a vehicle and opened fire. Two girls were killed aged 11 and 12-years-old and three adults were wounded.[374]
A man and three women were wounded in a late night shooting, the next day three suspects were arrested.[375]
A man was killed and four others injured shortly after midnight on a street corner.[376]
Three men and a woman were wounded in their vehicle on Interstate 580.[377]
Officers responding to a call of shots fired discovered four wounded individuals. A man later died at the hospital.[378]
Five men were wounded in an evening shooting. Officers believed the shooting was targeted at the group.[379]
Early in the morning, a group of men sitting on the sidewalk were shot at in a drive-by. One man was killed and four injured.[380]
Shortly after midnight three men and a woman were shot while waiting in a vehicle at a Shell gas station in River North neighborhood. The shooter was in a red sedan that they fled in.[381]
Three men and one women were wounded in a shooting.[382]
Three adults and one juvenile were wounded, after going to a residence and getting into an altercation. The shooter was a juvenile resident of the home.[383]
Four men were wounded in a public park in Sylmar in a drive-by shooting.[384]
A man shot and killed another man in a home, after mistaking it as the home of his intended target. He left, entered the intended home, and wounded three others.[385]
Two men were killed and two injured in a late-night shooting in the Kensington neighborhood.[386]
During an early morning field party, seven people were wounded after an argument between two men escalated.[387]
During a party at a rented house, four people were wounded and one killed when one person, followed by several others, fired handguns; over 60 gunshots were fired.[388]
Red Bluff shooting. An employee was killed and four injured at a Walmart distribution center. The perpetrator was later killed in a shootout with responding police.[389]
Officers responding to an early morning ShotSpotter alert found two men wounded and identified two women who arrived at a hospital to be a part of the incident.[390]
Early in the morning a man opened fire at a house party in Brooklyn, injuring four people.[391]
A man was killed and three others wounded after a large gathering in Douglas.[392]

A Missouri man traveled to the area for a house party, where a couple got into a physical domestic fight. Shortly after 911 was called in response to that fight, the man opened fire and killed his Uncle and two others, and wounded another.[393]
Five people were wounded by a shooter outside a local grocery store. Officers first thought the incident involved a gunfight among several people, but later announced it was one shooter.[394]
Four people were wounded at a house party shortly before midnight, after two shooters appeared near a neighboring home.[395]
Three adults and a 14-year-old boy were wounded in the early morning at a gas station. Prior to the shooting, a large crowd of people and cars had been gathered around the gas station.[396]
Four men were wounded after a shooting at an intersection in the Kensington neighborhood.[397]
A man was killed, and two adults and a 17-year-old injured while attempting to make a rap music video. Officers believed the shooting was targeted, as the victims refused to cooperate.[398]
Three adults and one juvenile were wounded in an early morning shooting. The suspected shooter was arrested.[399]
Four people were wounded while standing on a porch in a drive-by shooting in Burnside.[400]
Five people were wounded in a drive-by shooting during the evening. Responding police believed the shooter and victims knew each other.[401]
Police discovered five men wounded by gunfire in the Tenderloin neighborhood.[402]
During a Juneteenth block party over 100 shots were fired by multiple gunmen into a crowd of approximately 400 people. Four people were killed and 10 others were injured.[403][404][405]
Officers responding to a shooting on West Broadway Avenue discovered four people injured.[406]
Four people were wounded in the Willard-Hay neighborhood during the afternoon.[407]
Five people were wounded in a drive-by, including a 16-year-old girl, at an early morning gathering in East Garfield Park.[408]
Four people were wounded early in the morning after an individual opened fire from a vehicle in the Back of the Yards neighborhood on the South Side.[409]
Five people were shot during a vigil in the Crown Heights area of Brooklyn in the evening.[410]
Four men were wounded after a shooting at an early morning gathering of cars.[411]
Five people were wounded in an early morning shooting.[412]
Early in the morning there was a shooting at a house party. Five people were wounded; one died in a crash while being taken to hospital.[413]
Shortly after midnight, officers attended a home after a complaint of gunshots. They discovered four men wounded.[414]
An argument in Humboldt Park escalated shortly after midnight. A man was killed and three wounded.[415]
A group of people fired into a crowd, killing one and injuring 11 others.[416]
Officers arrived at a large party in a public parking lot responding to reports of a stolen car. An individual opened fire as they arrived and injured nine people including a 17-year-old.[417]
Three women and a man were injured after a fight broke out between two groups gathered at Claremont park.[418]
Four people were wounded in a drive-by shooting in the evening.[419]
A woman sitting in her car was killed and three others injured in another car early in the morning. A shoot-out had occurred in a large gathering nearby.[420]
Early in the morning two people were killed and two wounded in a shooting.[421]
One person was killed and four injured shortly after midnight.[422]
Five people were shot at a motel after an argument at a party in one of the rooms escalated. Police believe the shooting was intended to be targeted.[423]
Four people were wounded at an overnight park party in the Bronx after an argument escalated.[424]
Officers responding to a shots fired call in the early morning found four people wounded at an adult entertainment venue.[425]

Early in the morning a man was discovered by officers with a gunshot wound. Shortly after transporting the man to the hospital, six other victims were identified at local hospitals to be involved in the same shooting.[426]

Three adults and a nine-year-old child were wounded while standing in an apartment complex parking lot in the Gresham neighborhood. A man walked up and opened fire on the group, causing a shoot-out.[427]
In an apparent shoot-out at a birthday party, one man was killed and two women injured. A second, wounded, man died while attempting to drive away from the scene.[428]
An early morning shooting during a block party injured four people. The suspected shooter was arrested after a local traffic stop.[429]
A 15-year-old and three adults were gathered outside an apartment when they were injured in a drive-by shooting in the Montclare neighborhood.[430]
Early in the morning six people were wounded and one was killed in an incident. Officers were alerted via a ShotSpotter activation.[431]
About 100 people were gathered at a skate park in the early morning when someone opened fire. One person was killed and four injured.[432]
Four people were wounded in an early morning shooting at a local night club. A suspected shooter was arrested.[433]
Officers responded to an early morning shooting and found five people wounded.[434]
One man was killed and three others injured during the evening.[435]
Over 100 people attended a house party when someone opened fire, injuring five people.[436]
Shortly before midnight, four individuals were wounded in a shooting.[437]
Five individuals were wounded and one killed during an early morning shooting in the JeffVanderLou neighborhood.[438]
One person was killed and seven others wounded after a shooting at a house party. Local police believe the incident was gang related.[439]
An individual shot at a large group of people from a vehicle, killing two people and wounding five.[440]
Five people were wounded in the Fells Point neighborhood during a large gathering at Broadway Square, with many people drinking alcoholic drinks.[441]
Shortly before midnight responding officers discovered seven shooting victims. A man and woman later died at hospitals.[442]
Early in the morning five men and one woman were wounded after multiple men opened fire on a group in the Tioga neighborhood, causing the group to scatter and run away.[443]
A 19-year-old woman was killed and a man and a two teenagers wounded at a local park in the Bronx late at night.[444]

A man denied entry into a bar for being too drunk, stated "Don't you know who I am?" to the bouncer before leaving. He returned later with a rifle and opened fire injuring five women and three men.[445]
Shortly after midnight responding officers discovered two men wounded by gunfire. Another man and a woman were taken to hospital.[446]
A mother killed her neighbor and four children aged 12, 8, 5, and 5 months, then killed herself.[447]
Seven people including two juveniles were wounded in the Trinidad neighborhood of DC. Officers discovered the victims after hearing gunshots in the early morning.[448]
Two men were killed, and three men and a 13-year-old were wounded in a drive-by shooting while standing in an apartment complex parking lot.[449]
Shortly before midnight, officers discovered three men and one boy wounded by gunfire. One man died later at the hospital.[450]
A man shot and killed a civilian and wounded an officer. Responding officers killed the suspect; three officers were wounded after a short manhunt.[451]
Early in the morning ShotSpotter alerted officers to a graduation party. One 18-year-old was killed and three others wounded.[452]
Four adults and a six-year-old child were wounded in a drive-by shooting at a home and vehicle.[453]
Two women were killed and two adults and a 10-year-old child were injured at a child's birthday party late at night.[454]
Just before midnight there was a shootout in an apartment complex in the Northern Liberties neighborhood. Six people were wounded and a man was found dead behind some cars near the complex.[455]
A home was first shot at; when police investigated the shooters returned and opened fire. Four people were injured in the second shooting including an 18-month-old infant.[456]
A woman, two men and a 17-year-old were wounded after an argument escalated in Brooklyn. The shooter fled the scene.[457]
Five people were wounded inside the local American Legion club in the early morning; they all refused to speak with police.[458]
Officers responding to a shots-fired call discovered four wounded victims. One victim died in hospital; the other three did not cooperate with investigators.[459]
Six men were wounded in a late-night drive by shooting while standing on the sidewalk.[460]
Two women were killed and seven other people wounded at a house party by a drive-by shooting early in the morning.[461]
Six people between 15 and 21-years-old were wounded in the early morning during a social gathering.[462]
One person was killed and four were wounded near a house party after an altercation escalated.[463]
Four men were injured after a fight between a large number of people escalated in a local bar's parking lot.[464]
An argument escalated in the early morning with at least two individuals opening fire. One man died and four others were wounded.[465]
Four people were wounded in an early morning shooting. A juvenile was later arrested in connection with the shooting.[466]
Shortly before midnight authorities responded to a home fire. Seven people killed by gunshots were found after the fire was put out.[467]
Three teenagers and two adults aged between 18 and 20-years-old were wounded at a local beach. Officials do not think there is a connection between it and the protests that occurred that night.[468]
Four people were wounded after two gunmen opened fire in a bar. A woman later died in hospital.[469]
Four males were wounded while standing on the sidewalk when a shooter approached and fired at them.[470]
Four St. Louis police officers were wounded during an altercation with protestors near police headquarters.[471]
Six people were shot when a man opened fire on a block party. The suspect has not been apprehended.[472]
A 12-year-old and three adults were wounded in a shooting in the Kensington section of the city.[473]
An 18-year-old was killed and five others injured after someone opened fire early in the morning at a large gathering of people.[474]
Four people were shot at a mobile home park; one was killed and three  hospitalized.[475]
One person was killed and five, including a law enforcement officer, wounded at a birthday party at a local dragstrip.[476]
Six people were shot, one fatally, in the early morning at a block party after multiple individuals opened fire.[477]
One person was killed and four wounded including two and 12-year-old children, during a block party.[478]
Five individuals were wounded in a shooting, including a 10-year-old boy. All victims left the scene for hospital via private vehicles, while police were called to the scene.[479]
Two men approached four people sitting on their porch and opened fire in the evening. A man was killed and two others and a woman were injured.[480]
A road rage incident near I-240 wounded two children and two adults.[481]
Seven people were injured in a shooting during a protest against police brutality in the aftermath of the death of Breonna Taylor, two seriously.[482]
Five men with gunshot wounds were found by police; one died.[483]
Four people were wounded outside of a gas station, in the early morning; one  died.[484]
A group of five men were wounded outside an apartment complex by a shooter before the individual fled on foot.[485]
Four men were shot and wounded in a drive-by shooting in the morning, and all taken to the hospital in private vehicles.[486]
Shortly after midnight four people aged between 16 and 27 were shot in a Waffle House parking lot.[487]
Five people were wounded in a shooting outside an apartment complex, ranging in age from mid-teens to early 20s.[488]
Four people were wounded in a late night shooting.[489]
A man selling items on a street corner was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting. A pedestrian was also killed and two others wounded.[490]
A drive-by shooting at a neighborhood cookout in the early morning left three individuals dead and five injured.[491]
A 17-year-old shooter and others engaged in a shootout at a graduation party, three 15-year-olds, a 16-year-old, a 17-year-old, and the shooter were injured.[492][493]
A man was shot and later died at the hospital, while four others, including the suspect, were wounded after a shooting at a private residence.[494]
Four people were shot in the early morning at an intersection.[495]
Police responding to calls about gunshots found three people dead and one injured at a private residence.[496]
Four people were wounded shortly after midnight in a what may have been a gang-related shooting. Six people were arrested.[497]
Officers responding to a shooting found four individuals who were taken to hospital; one died.[498]
A man was killed and four others injured after a fight at a large gathering on a street escalated into a shooting.[499]
A man and 17-year-old were killed and five others wounded at a block party after the state's quarantine order was lifted.[500]
Six people were shot in a parking lot after an argument escalated.[501]
A shooting left one dead and three in critical condition.[502]
A shooter pulled up outside a home and opened fire on four men standing on the porch. One was killed and three injured.[503]
Two people were shot and four others wounded by bullet fragments after a shooter opened fire on a crowded beach.[504]
Five men were wounded outside a Jamaican restaurant in the early morning. All were taken to hospital; they refused to cooperate with police.[505]
A fight escalated at a bar, with the perpetrator leaving, driving to the back of the bar, and opening fire, wounding four men.[506]
A man was killed and three other individuals wounded after shots were fired near a local deli in the early morning.[507]
A man shot and killed his pregnant ex-girlfriend and wounded her sister, mother, and boyfriend, then committed suicide after being surrounding by police.[508]
Five men were wounded shortly after midnight.[509]
Five teenagers, aged 18 and 17-years-old, were wounded after a man fired into the apartment from outside the complex.[510]
Three people were wounded when an individual opened fire at a party that was hosted at a short-term rental. A woman walking her dog near the home was also wounded.[511]
Police responded to a shooting and found an 18-year-old dead on the sidewalk. Three injured victims were identified later.[512]
A mother and her 15- and 12-year-old daughters were shot and killed by her husband, who wounded another daughter before killing himself. Another daughter was uninjured and ran for help.[513]
Hundreds of people had gathered for a memorial service when multiple shooters began firing, wounding thirteen people.[514]
Police responding to a call of shots fired discovered five individuals, including a pregnant woman, wounded after an argument had escalated.[515]
One person was killed and four injured in a believed targeted shooting at a gas station.[516]
Six people were involved in the repossession of a vehicle; one opened fire killing one and injuring four.[517]
Police responding to a call about a gunshot victim discovered one victim; three others were taken to hospital by car.[518]
A dispute between two neighbors escalated causing five people, including a five-year-old girl, to be wounded.[519]
Multiple gunmen were involved in a shootout at a local food market, wounding five including a minor.[520]
Five people were wounded in a public park where hundreds were gathered. Some thought the gunfire was fireworks.[521]
Four people were wounded during a late night shooting.[522]
Four men were discovered shot on the city's west side in the evening.[523]
Two men were shot and killed in a vehicle; two others were wounded after attempting to exit the vehicle and being shot at in a drive-by.[524]
A 16-year-old was killed and three others wounded in a vehicle after the car was shot at multiple times in the early morning.[525]
A man was killed and three others wounded after an incident of road rage escalated.[526]
Four people were wounded after an individual opened fire at a house party.[527]
A man drove up to a street and after exiting the car fired at least 30 shots into a crowd of people, wounding four men.[528]
Five teenagers aged 15 through 19 years old were injured in a drive-by shooting after attending a large gathering.[529]
A man and three women were injured in a shooting in the evening.[530]
Four people were wounded in a shooting that involved two vehicles and an additional four people near Perry Park.[531]

Five people, aged between 14 and 41, were killed in a home, with a child being uninjured in the violence. Police treated the incident as  domestic violence.[532] The shooter was sentenced to 205 years in prison in 2021.[533]
One individual was killed and four others, including a juvenile, were injured after a fight escalated into a shooting.[534]
Four people were wounded in the city's South End in an early morning shooting.[535]
One person was killed and three others, one 17 years old, wounded in an early morning shooting.[536]
Seven people were discovered wounded after police responded to an aggravated assault call. They were wounded in a drive-by shooting after heading to an early morning party.[537]
An 18-year-old athlete who was to play at the University of Louisville was killed and four others injured in a late night shooting.[538]
Police responding to a shots-fired call found four people injured.[539]
Three people were killed and one injured in an apartment by two shooters. Due to the lack of forced entry it is thought that the victims may have known the shooters.[540]
Two men were killed and two injured in a late-night shooting.[541]
One man was killed and four others injured after multiple individuals opened fire on a backyard gathering before fleeing in a car and continuing to fire.[542][543]
Responding police discovered three adults and a juvenile injured by a shooting. An adult later died in the hospital.[544]
A five-year-old girl was killed and three adults wounded after someone shot into an apartment.[545]
One juvenile and five adults were wounded when a large party at an apartment complex was fired upon by at least four shooters.[546]
Police were alerted about shots fired shortly after midnight, and arrived to find the suspect had fled and the four wounded had taken themselves to hospital.[547]
One man and three women were injured after an altercation escalated. A male shooter escaped the scene, and a female was arrested for pointing a weapon at one of the wounded.[548]
Police responding to a call of shots fired found one person wounded. An additional three connected to the shooting were found in local hospitals.[549]
A 19-year-old was killed and three others individuals were wounded at an apartment complex.[550]
One man was killed and three other people wounded, including a 5-year-old, after an individual came out of an alley and fired on the group. One of the group likely returned fire at the shooter.[551]
Four men were wounded in an early morning shooting in a Brooklyn apartment.[552]
One man was killed and four other individuals were wounded in a drive-by shooting in which people standing outside a house and sitting in a car were fired upon.[553]
One man was killed and two other men and one woman were injured in an afternoon shooting.[554]
Police officers responding to a shots-fired call found four wounded individuals, with the shooter arrested later.[555]
Police responding to a shots fired call found a dead man and teenaged girl, and two seriously wounded individuals.[556]

A man shot and wounded his ex-girlfriend's relatives before barricading himself with her and their 9-year-old child in the home. During the stand-off an officer and the ex-girlfriend were wounded, and the man was killed by police.[557]
Police responding to calls about a shooting discovered two people wounded; two other wounded people drove themselves to the hospital.[558]

A domestic argument escalated, and a man shot and killed his child's mother, step-father, and sister before abducting his two-year-old child. The shooter was arrested and the child recovered after an Amber Alert was issued.[559]

Five people were wounded at a late night memorial gathering after a man fired into the crowd from half-a-block away. The wounded included a two-year-old, a fourteen-year-old, and an eighteen-year-old.[560]
Four people were wounded in a late-night shooting, with two of the wounded under the age of 18. One of the wounded was showing signs of COVID-19.[561]
One man was killed and two others and a teenager wounded in a drive-by shooting by three shooters.[562]

Four people in a car were wounded by a shooter in the early morning. Three of the victims took themselves to hospitals before police arrived. The victim found by officers knew who had shot him, but refused to cooperate with police questions.[563]
Four people were injured in an early morning shooting.[564]
Four people were discovered to be wounded in a shooting after police received a report about a shooting.[565]
Three men and a woman were shot and wounded leaving a bar early in the morning. A second woman was injured by the crowd fleeing the scene.[566]
Five people were shot by a man wearing all-black and possibly a face mask; one died at the scene. One of the wounded is a three-year-old child.[567]
Police reported that seven civilians were injured during a police-involved shooting.[568]

2020 Springfield, Missouri shooting: A shooter killed four people, including a police officer, and injured two others, including another police officer, before committing suicide at a gas station.[569]
Seven adult members of the same family were killed in an apparent murder suicide and were discovered after reports of shots fired.[570]
Police responding to a shooting found three women and one man injured; two women died.[571]
Reportedly a group of young men burst into a home and started shooting early in the morning. They wounded a woman, a 16-year-old girl and a 17-year-old girl and killed a man.[572]
Four men riding in a vehicle shot and wounded five people, including a 15-year-old boy, in a drive-by shooting, in the Algiers neighborhood.[citation needed]
Three men and one woman were wounded after another man opened fire inside of an apartment. The man was later arrested by police.[573]
Police responding to a shooting discovered two 15-year-old boys killed and a third juvenile injured. A fourth wounded juvenile involved in the shooting was later identified at a medical center.[574]
Police responded to reports of a shooting and discovered three wounded individuals, one of whom later died. A fourth victim arrived at a hospital in a private vehicle.[575]
An early morning argument escalated and resulted in one man killed and three injured outside a local business.[576]
Four men were wounded in a vehicle on Bishop Ford Freeway, after another vehicle's occupant(s) fired on them.[577]

A 13-year-old boy was killed, five others were wounded; a 14-year-old boy and girl, two 12-year-old boys and a 19-year-old man were wounded. The group was shot at in a parking lot after an altercation while attending a Triple Threat Elite Dance event.[578]
Seventeen people were wounded and one killed after a shootout between multiple motorcycle clubs after a fight at one of the club's headquarters caused many to be thrown out.[579]
Three adults and one child were injured by a shooter while leaving a house party. The shooter was later arrested.[580]
Six men and a woman were injured in a drive-by shooting after leaving a house party after a fight broke out in the Greater Grand Crossing neighborhood.[581]
Four males, one female and a five-year-old child were discovered by police wounded in a drive-by shooting.[582]
One was killed while five others were injured at a mass shooting during a celebration of life.[583]
Four people were injured and one person was fatally wounded at a shooting.[584]
Five people were wounded in a drive by shooting, before the perpetrators fled.[585]
Milwaukee brewery shooting: Five people were killed when a gunman opened fire at the local Molson Coors Beverage Company campus, where he had been employed, then committed suicide.

In a shooting at a convenience store in the Avalon Park neighborhood four people were hurt and one person was killed. The four wounded victims were listed in serious-to-critical condition. It was reported  that three people, including two men and a woman, exited a vehicle and started firing inside the store. They fled in a white vehicle after the arrival of police.[586]
Six people were injured in a shooting at a business.[587]
Seven people were shot and wounded, not critically, at a flea market where a dance event with adults and children was taking place. A suspect was arrested and charged with assault.[588]
Three people were killed and one person was injured in a shooting. A suspect turned himself in to local authorities and was charged with three counts of murder and one count of attempted murder.[589]
Two people were fatally shot and three others, including a police officer, were wounded in a shooting at an apartment complex. The suspect was among the dead.[590]
Four men were sent to a hospital after police said there were wounded in a shooting in the street.[591]
A man killed his wife and two children before killing himself.[592]
There was a shooting in the North Side of the city where four people were injured, two critically. A suspect was arrested.[593]
Four students of Alcorn State University were involved in a shooting off campus; two were killed and two injured.[594]
One person was killed and four others injured, two seriously, in a drive-by shooting.[595]
A shooting occurred at a bar where one victim was killed and three others were wounded.[596]
One person was killed and four others were wounded in a shooting at a nightclub.[597]
Four people, two men and two women, were wounded in a shooting blocks away from the city's Mardi Gras Parade route.[598]
Seven people were wounded when an unknown shooter opened fire at a street race after an argument escalated.[599]
Three adults and three children were wounded in a shooting at a gathering in an apartment complex in the South Side of the city.[600]
One person was fatally shot and four others were wounded in a shooting.[601]

A heated argument turned violent between a man and a woman in front of a house which led to a shooting. Four people were injured, three seriously, and taken to hospital. Two of the injured were charged afterwards.[602]
Three people were killed and two others were injured in a shooting at a club. One of the victims was found dead inside a car. At least one suspect was arrested.[603]
A 29-year-old rap artist was killed and three others were wounded in a shooting in North Houston. The suspects were thought to be gang members.[604]
One man was killed and three others wounded, two critically, in a shooting outside and inside a home in Waco. Police believe that the shooting was due to a sale of illicit drugs gone wrong.[605]
Three males and a female were fatally shot on the Northeast section of the city.[606]
Three people were killed and another was injured in the towns of Machias and Jonesboro.  A 63-year-old man was charged with the crime.[607]

One person was killed and five others were injured from a shooting on a Greyhound bus heading from Los Angeles to San Francisco. The bus was traversing Tejon Pass on Interstate 5, near Lebec, California, and stopped in Grapevine after the shooting.[608]

Police responded to a street location where multiple shots were fired. They found four victims, aged 18–45 years old, with bullet wounds. Three of the victims were transported by helicopter to a hospital.[609]

A shooter shot and killed two members of a family and a friend of one of them inside a house. A third fled through a window uninjured and alerted the authorities. The shooter then committed suicide.[610]

One person was killed and four others injured, one critically, in a shooting incident that occurred in several locations. The shooting happened during a memorial gathering for a victim who was killed in a traffic accident.[611]
A shooting left one victim dead and the other three injured in the 200 block of Northeast First Court.[612]
A shooting occurred at an apartment complex where four teens were injured. All four victims, aged 15–17 years old, suffered non-life-threatening injuries.[613]
Four teenagers were injured, one critically, in a shooting on public streets.[614]
Four men were wounded outside the Golden Hill Street Courthouse while sitting in a car, in a drive-by shooting by multiple shooters.[615]
Four family members were shot at a home. Three of the victims were killed; a child, was seriously wounded. The suspect was apprehended and arrested by the police.[616]
Multiple shots were fired inside a business where five people were wounded in a shooting.[617]
Six people were injured by a shooting shortly after midnight, at a local restaurant. An additional three others were treated for non-gunfire related injuries.[618]
Three people were fatally shot and four others were injured at a bar.[619]
A man shot and killed his wife and three children, aged between eight months and four years old, and the family dog. He then killed himself.[620]
A woman killed one  Illinois State Trooper and injured two others before killing herself at a cigar lounge.[621]
Eight people were shot, one fatally, outside a McDonald's restaurant on Pine Street in Downtown Seattle.[622]
Two people (including the perpetrator) were killed and fifteen others were injured during a shooting at a nightclub.[623]
Police discovered two people dead and two injured after responding to a shooting.[624]
One person was killed and four others were injured during a shooting outside a nightclub.[625]
Two people were killed and five others injured at a nightclub.[626]

Haynie family shooting: Four people were killed and one was injured after a teenager allegedly fired at his family at their house. He was charged with four counts of aggravated murder, one count of attempted aggravated murder and five counts of illegal discharge of a firearm.[627]
Three children between 11 and 16 years old were injured along with two adults after two perpetrators fired into a barber shop in the East Garfield Park neighborhood.[628]
Two people were killed and two injured after a shooting in a home's detached garage.[629]
Five people, including three teenagers, were wounded by a 16-year-old shooter at an apartment building.[630]
Two people were killed and two injured in a random ambush style shooting. The perpetrator was arrested after arriving at his mother's house covered in blood.[631]
Four people were injured by a single person after an argument near a northwestern Atlanta nightclub early in the morning.[632]
One man was killed and three men were injured in a mid-morning shooting.[633]
Four people were wounded in a drive-by shooting outside an apartment building in the Sunset Park neighborhood.[634]
Responding police discovered three people dead and one wounded at an early morning shooting in the Benton Park neighborhood.[635]
An argument in a Downtown Cleveland night club's VIP section led to three people being wounded; a fourth person was shot in the head in the back alley.[636]
Seven people were wounded inside and outside a hookah bar early in the morning, after an argument escalated.[637]
A family of four, including nine-year-old twin boys, were shot and killed at their home after celebrating New Year's Eve. A 16-year-old boy was seriously injured.[638]
